summary.span: 控制对网络上域名系统 (DNS) 服务器的访问权限。

span.span: Controls rights to access Domain Name System (DNS) servers on the network.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认权限允许所有本地和 Intranet 区域应用程序访问 DNS 服务，不允许 DNS 权限访问 Internet 区域应用程序。The default permissions allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access DNS services, and no DNS permission for Internet zone applications.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed

span.span: One of the values.

summary.span: 创建 类的新实例，该类或者允许无限制的 DNS 访问，或者不允许 DNS 访问。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class that either allows unrestricted DNS access or disallows DNS access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `state` 为 ，则 实例将传递所有需求。If `state` is , the instance passes all demands. 如果 `state` 包含任何其他值，则 实例将无法满足所有需求。If `state` contains any other value, the instance fails all demands. ## Examples 以下示例创建 类的实例。The following example creates an instance of the class. summary.span: 创建当前权限实例的相同副本。

span.span: Creates an identical copy of the current permission instance.

returns.span: 类的新实例，是当前实例的相同副本。

span.span: A new instance of the class that is an identical copy of the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例的副本 提供对 DNS 服务器的相同访问权限。A copy of a instance provides the same access to DNS servers as the original permission instance. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个现有实例的相同副本 。The following example creates an identical copy of an existing instance. span.span: If both the current instance and are unrestricted, this method returns a new instance that is unrestricted; otherwise, it returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个 实例，该实例允许由当前 实例和指定的实例定义的访问 。The method returns a instance that allows the access defined by both the current instance and the specified instance. 任何需求都必须传递两个权限才能传递其交集。Any demand must pass both permissions to pass their intersection. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个权限实例，该实例是当前权限实例与指定权限实例的交集。The following example creates a permission instance that is the intersection of the current permission instance and the specified permission instance. summary.span: 确定当前权限实例是否是指定权限实例的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current permission instance is a subset of the specified permission instance.

returns.span: 如果当前实例是不受限制的，并且 或者为 或者是不受限制的，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the current instance is unrestricted and is either or unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前实例 指定的一组操作完全包含在指定的实例中，则当前实例是指定实例的子集 。The current instance is a subset of the specified instance if the current instance specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified instance. 如果该 方法返回 `true` ，则当前 实例不允许比指定的实例对 DNS 服务器的访问权限 。If the method returns `true`, the current instance allows no more access to DNS servers than does the specified instance. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来确定当前权限实例是否为指定权限实例的子集。The following example uses the method to determine whether the current permission instance is a subset of the specified permission instance.
